wikitext.*:
'''''lambe''''' is a noun meaning "tongue" in [[Quenya]].<ref name="Names">{{App|Letters}}, Note, ''The names of the letters''</ref>

[[Image:Lambe.gif|left]]''Lambe'' is also the name in Quenya of the twenty-seventh letter of the [[Tengwar]] alphabet.<ref name="Names"/>  In all modes this letter represents '''L'''.<ref>{{App|Letters}}, Note, ''The additional letters''</ref>  The Westron name for this letter is '''''Alo'''''.<ref>See ''[[Alphabet of Fëanor: Numenian, or Westron, Mode]]''</ref>


<!-- Extra blank line needed to keep Etymology from indenting -->
==Etymology==
The word derives from the [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme|root]] [[LAB]].<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}, LAB -</ref>
